name: Surestay Plus Hotel by Best Western Superstition Springs
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Surestay Plus Hotel by Best Western Superstition Springs! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Surestay PLUS Hotel by Best Western Superstition Springs is located close to Tempe, Scottsdale, Chandler, Gilbert, Apache Junction and Phenix. This hotel is located on the grounds of Superstition Springs Center, featuring over 150 stores. The Phenix-Mesa Gateway Airport is seven miles from the hotel.
Guests of this eco-friendly hotel will enjoy amenities like free hot breakfast buffet and 24-hour coffee and tea. Additional amenities include a free newspaper, free local calls, outdoor heated pool and hot tub. Business travelers will appreciate conveniences like free wireless high-speed Internet access, a business center and access to copy and fax services.
All guest rooms include coffee makers, hair dryers, irons, ironing boards and refrigerators. A newsstand and guest laundry facilities are located on the property.
There are a wide variety of restaurants and several shops located in the area. The 5 & Diner restaurant, located next door, offers room service.
In addition, the hotel is close to attractions like Casino Arizona, Arizona State University,  Talking Stick Resort Arena, Chase Field, the Phenix Zoo and the Desert Botanical Garden. Leisure World Arizona, the Mesa Amphitheater, Salt River Canyon and the Boyce Thompson Arboretum, Sloan Park and Hohokam Stadium are also nearby. Phenix Sky Harbor International Airport is 20 miles from the hotel.

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Phoenix - Mesa - West
description:
This Extended Stay America is located in Mesa and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America Phenix is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows.
Weekly housekeeping services provided for free and daily housekeeping is provided for a fee. Towels and linen may be exchanged at the front desk. Free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning.
Free onsite parking is offered at Extended Stay America Mesa.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Mesa at Wrigleyville West
description:
Featuring 3-star accommodations, Courtyard by Marriott Mesa at Wrigleyville West is located in Mesa, 14 miles from Phoenix Convention Center and 5.6 miles from Hall of Flame Firefighting Museum. Featuring a fitness center, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has a hot tub and shared lounge, and Copper Square is 13 miles away.
At the hotel, every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Courtyard by Marriott Mesa at Wrigleyville West the rooms have bed linen and towels.
√Ä la carte and American breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation.
Free private parking and a business center are available, as well as a 24-hour front desk.
Phoenix Zoo is 6.5 miles from Courtyard by Marriott Mesa at Wrigleyville West, while Desert Botanical Gardens is 7 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport, 8.1 miles from the hotel.

name: Super 8 by Wyndham Mesa Gilbert
description:
This Super 8 is located in Mesa, Arizona, just 15-minute' drive to HoHoKam Park Stadium. It features an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi.
Super 8 Phenix-Mesa provides a refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker in every room. A seating area and work desk are also offered for added comfort.
The Super 8 Phenix-Mesa/Gilbert has laundry facilities on site. The front desk is available 24 hours and every morning a grab and go breakfast is served.
Fiesta Mall, Mesa Community College and the Arizona Museum of Natural History are all within a 10-minute drive of this Mesa Super 8. Phenix Sky Harbor International Airport is 30 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Phoenix - Mesa
description:
This Extended Stay America - Phenix - Mesa is located in Mesa and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Phenix is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities and upgraded bedding with extra pillows.
Weekly housekeeping services provided for free and daily housekeeping is provided for a fee. Towels and linen may be exchanged at the front desk. Free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning. The property offers free onsite parking.
Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Movie Theater and the Performing Arts Center.

userReviews.title: Skip this place
userReviews.positive: Location was a short drive to family we were visiting
userReviews.negative:
Room, public areas, elevator. 
Furniture was out dated and very very very worn. Looked as if the furniture was left over from a garage sale. If you needed clean towels you had to take the dirty towels to the desk & request clean. Housekeepiing was an extra charge that isn't disclosed until you sign in. Ad says they offer free breakfast, which is 3 pots of coffee in the loddy. Public areas are not well cleaned. Elevator sometimes did not want to work plus dirty. The cook top in the room was an old style 2 place hot plate style. Light fixtures in room were old and some had damage. If you wanted cooking items, pans, plates etc you had to get items from the front desk, if they had the item. You had to enter thru the front lobby door. Could not enter thru exterior doors becasue they had removed all all access swipe pads. Guests & employees blocked exterior doors open so they could go outside to smoke. When done doors were left blocked open and unsecured. Have never had a hotel ask for ID's from others staying in the room. To me this is a red flag that they have issues at this property.
In the past stayed at a Hilton Homes 2 Suites in the area. Had none of these issues and was minimally more.

name: Quality Inn & Suites near Downtown Mesa
description:
This hotel in Mesa, Arizona features an outdoor pool and guest rooms include free WiFi. HoHoKam Park, spring training home of the Chicago Cubs baseball team, is 4 miles away.
Each room at Quality Inn & Suites by Choice hotels which provides cable TV with the HBO channel. All rooms are furnished with coffee facilities, a microwave and a refrigerator.
Laundry facilities are also available at the hotel.
Quality Inn & Suites by Choice Hotels is 20 minutes from the Sky Harbor International Airport. Mesa Arts Center is 2.4 miles away. The Gilbert Rd/Main Street light rail station is 2.7 miles from the property.

name: Hyatt Place Phoenix/ Mesa
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, a 14-person hot tub and a 9-hole putting green, this hotel is 15 minutes‚Äô drive from Phenix Sky Harbor International Airport. Free WiFi and docking stations are provided in all rooms.
Offering a flat-screen cable TV, each room at Phenix/Mesa Hyatt Place provides free toiletries, a seating area and an private bathroom.
Mini-golf and an indoor fitness center are also provided. Cycling, hiking and golf opportunities are nearby.
The 24/7 Gallery menus offers dining options for any time of day. Guests can enjoy a coffee in the morning or a cocktail in the evening at Coffee to Cocktails Bar.
The Hyatt Place is 1.1 mi from Sloan Lake, the Chicago Cubs Spring Training Stadium, and is 2.6 mi from the Oakland A's Hohokam Stadium. Free transfer services is offered within a 1.9 mi radius of the hotel. Casa Grande Ruins National Monument is 1 hour's drive from Hyatt Place Phenix/ Mesa.

userReviews.title: Price Gouged For A One Night Stay
userReviews.positive: We had stayed in this hotel back in October 2022. We liked the fact that Hyatt Place at this location had availability 2 weeks prior to our arrival. We also loved this hotel's close  location to restaurants and the movie theater.
userReviews.negative:
Booked our room via online booking.com agent.The total price for one night stay was over $400. Very disappointed with the price gouging. I understand the need to raise prices, but not to the extreme. Not able to understand why hotels raise their prices to the extreme whenever major events are in town. I was further disappointed after being overcharged for this room and later offered a lower price for future bookings. In October 2022, I paid $555 for a total of 3 nights stay for 3 guests in this same hotel. 
  Another thing we didn't like in this hotel is the low voltage lighting in our bathroom. The lighting in our bathrooms in our past visit and recent visit was very poor. Not sure how housekeeping can clearly see how to sanitize and properly clean the bathtub and toilet. 
  Lastly, the mattress on one of the beds in our room was so badly worn and broken down. It was very difficult  sleeping on this bed with the mattress collapsing to the point of near-dumping me onto the floor. I couldn't sit on the bed to get in it from the side that shared the nightstand. I had to get in the bed from the opposite side to avoid the mattress collapsing. This mattress should be replaced. I had to carefully sleep on the opposite side of that bed. We didn't ask to change our room because we arrived late, exhausted and didn't want to go through any hassle trying to find out if the hotel had a better room available.

name: Doubletree by Hilton Phoenix Mesa
description:
Located in the East Valley next to a 9-hole golf course, this Mesa, Arizona hotel offers guestrooms with contemporary amenities and relaxing facilities.
DoubleTree by Hilton Phenix Mesa features an outdoor heated pool and a hot tub. Guests can enjoy room service beside the pool or workout in the fitness center, which provides cardiovascular and weight training equipment. The hotel's concierge desk can assist in a variety of activities such as sightseeing trips to the Grand Canyon or an evening cruise on Canyon Lake.
Open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, DoubleTree by Hilton Phenix Mesa serves continental cuisine, local micro brews and delicious margaritas. After dinner, guests can sip on a beverage and relax in the hotel's sky-lit, 8-story atrium at the Atrium Lounge.

name: Extend -a -Suites Mesa
description:
Located in Mesa, 21 miles from Phoenix Convention Center, Extend -a -Suites Mesa has accommodations with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 21 miles from Copper Square, 12 miles from Sea Life Arizona and 12 miles from Hall of Flame Firefighting Museum. userReviews.title: Great pool, comfy hotel
userReviews.positive: The room is comfy, the bed, pillows are great. Swimming pool is heated so it's not hard to jump in especially we've had a some rainy windy days here.
userReviews.negative: The reason we chosed the hotel was trying to recap old memories when my husband were a kid. Overall it's a really old hotel but still charging the same rate as other newer hotels. I'm sure it has been renovated a few times over 40 years(when my husband was a litle kid)but I guess if it still wants to charge the similar amount and really want to compete with others, it could be better(or cheaper). The one thing I think it's worth paying is their swimming pool (Jacuzzi is hot but broken-no jets/bubbles). Because this swimming pool was built long time ago without brand standard, it still kept the original shape which is huge. You don't find any other chain hotels now has this type of swimming pools anymore. That's actually the reason we picked this hotel(other than memory lane reason). We came for spring training- stayed 2 night 3 days and spent a lot of time by the swimming pool...that was great!
userReviews.room: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds

I asked if I could take some food up to the room when I was headed back so that everyone else could sleep in, but not miss out on the great food. 
Alex offered to box up fresh food with plates and utensils.  It was such a sweet gesture, I just about cried!
It was a nice experience for me on this trip - it's always wonderful to meet kind people.
Kevin at the front desk was also amazingly helpful and kind!
Thank you!

name: American Executive Inn Mesa
description:
One block from the light rail, this Mesa hotel features a seasonal outdoor pool and laundry facilities. All guest rooms include free Wi-Fi. Arizona State University is a 20-minute drive from the property.
At the American Executive Inn, guests can relax in the outdoor picnic area which has BBQ facilities. Vending machines providing beverages are available for added convenience.
All air-conditioned rooms at the American Executive Inn feature cable TV, and  a microwave and a fridge are also provided. Select units include a kitchen or spa tub.
Shops and restaurants are available in downtown Mesa, which is 2 miles from the hotel. The Arizona Golf Resort is a 20-minute drive from the property.

userReviews.negative:
I called before I got on the plane to confirm that they were picking up from the airport.  I was told they would and to just call when I get bags and they will come pick me up.  She said it was only a couple minutes away.  I called after I got my bags and was then told they would arrange a Lyft to pick me up.  They had to arrange ride and it was over hour before Lyft arrived.  
I tried to iron a shirt and there was some sticky stuff on the iron that i did not notice until I put it on my shirt and it stuck to my shirt.  I notified the "manager" in the morning and she said, "sorry" and walked away.  No offer to pay for my shirt which was not expensive but the offer would have been appreciated.  Also the knowledge that she would let housekeeping know to check the iron before putting them back in closet for the next person to use. The day clerk did deduct $15 off my bill after the manager woman walked away.  
I also told her that there was no light bulb in my bathroom above the sink...only above the toilet.  It was very dark in the bathroom but I checked in after midnight so I did not mention it then and I was checking out in the morning.  Again, I would have liked her to say, she would remind housekeeping to report this to maintenance.  
My TV would not work, the cables in the back were unplugged.  I told the lady manager and again she said nothing.  
All these things could have been avoided if housekeeping had notified someone when they prepared the room for the next guest.   I suggested they create. a checklist for housekeeping to use at checkout
userReviews.room: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds - Non Smoking

userReviews.positive: They include free breakfast every morning and let me just say, everything was so delightful.  I loved the different choices that were available, from a nice hot bowl of oatmeal with toppings you can add, delicious savory breakfast sandwiches and my favorite,  freshly griddled waffles (which you get to make yourself). The seating area is well kept up with cleanliness and sanitation products were at your convenience.  The location is also one of my other favorite things about Homes2 Suites.  There are great mountain views nearby, along with a beautiful lush green golf course and if you are bringing your pet, there is a devoted area where you can take them to relieve themselves.  The feel of this place was so relaxing and peaceful, like all my stress just vanished.  All the staff and amenities were so great in making Homes2 Suites a friendly environment, I definitely will be back.
userReviews.negative: If it was a little cheaper.  But in the end, no matter how much was spent, it was very well worth it.  And I would still spend that amount again in a heartbeat.
